short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check imgurs for file types, no more surprises!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Checks imgurs when you open an image, to see if it's animated or not. 

This is designed specifically for live streamers, in an effort to help them from being banned by gifs that show illicit content.
